view

Class CliMVP

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.CLI
      • view.CliMVP
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class CliMVP
extends view.CLI
implements Runnable
    This is the cli we use in the MVP pattern. a generic cli that works with all the different types of commands.
    Author:
    Ran Saroussi
